Uses of Class
com.sun.tools.attach.VirtualMachine

  • Packages that use VirtualMachine 
    Package Description
    com.sun.tools.attach
    Provides the API to attach to a JavaTM virtual machine.
    com.sun.tools.attach.spi
    Only developers who are defining new attach providers should need to make direct use of this package.

    • Uses of VirtualMachine in com.sun.tools.attach

      Methods in com.sun.tools.attach that return VirtualMachine 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static VirtualMachine VirtualMachine.attach(String id)
      Attaches to a Java virtual machine.
      static VirtualMachine VirtualMachine.attach(VirtualMachineDescriptor vmd)
      Attaches to a Java virtual machine.

      Attaches to a Java virtual machine.
      VirtualMachine AttachProvider.attachVirtualMachine(VirtualMachineDescriptor vmd)
      Attaches to a Java virtual machine.
